body.subject: Epic 28 implementation complete - Deployment readiness notification
body.summary: All 8 workstreams (18 tasks) of Epic 28 completed. Implementation includes God Agent 'Alfred' with intent routing, task planning, 5 skill adapters, consensus workflow, safety guardrails, observability (Prometheus metrics), voice integration. All tests passing (unit, integration, security, performance, smoke). Code quality verified (MyPy, linting, Clean Architecture). Awaiting quality approval (release_gate: true) for deployment unblocking. Deployment requirements from deployment.json satisfied.
key_points: Implementation complete: All 18 tasks completed, all tests passing
Deployment requirements satisfied: implementation.json created, test_evidence provided (unit, integration, security, performance, smoke), code quality verified
Metrics endpoint: Prometheus metrics exported (god_agent_tasks_total, god_agent_plan_duration_seconds, god_agent_veto_total, god_agent_skill_latency_seconds)
Dependencies: MongoDB (shared infra), Prometheus (shared infra), Qwen LLM (local), no external SaaS
Integration points: Telegram bot handler (GodAgentTelegramHandler), Voice pipeline (VoicePipelineAdapter), Butler bot (extends without breaking changes)
Configuration: No new environment variables required, uses existing shared infrastructure
Rollback plan: All components are stateless or use existing infrastructure, rollback is safe

deployment_checklist.test_evidence: ✅ Complete - unit (>= 75-95%), integration, security (7/7), performance (3/3), smoke (5/5)
deployment_checklist.code_quality: ✅ Verified - MyPy passes, linting passes, Clean Architecture compliance
deployment_checklist.security: ✅ Verified - input sanitization tests pass, no external SaaS dependencies
deployment_checklist.performance: ✅ Verified - all targets met (< 150ms memory, < 5s intent, < 30s multi-step)
deployment_checklist.metrics: ✅ Implemented - Prometheus metrics exported, structured logging
deployment_checklist.quality_approval: ⏳ Pending - awaiting quality engineer review and release_gate: true

deployment_notes.infrastructure: No new infrastructure required. Uses existing shared MongoDB, Prometheus, Qwen LLM. God Agent integrates with existing Butler bot without breaking changes.
deployment_notes.configuration: No new environment variables. Uses existing configuration from shared infrastructure.
deployment_notes.monitoring: Prometheus metrics available at standard endpoint. Structured logs include task_id, skill_id, plan_step for observability.
deployment_notes.rollback: Safe rollback - all components are stateless or use existing infrastructure. GodAgentTelegramHandler can be disabled without affecting Butler bot.
deployment_notes.staged_rollout: Per deployment.json: Stage 1 (internal testing), Stage 2 (10% users), Stage 3 (50% users), Stage 4 (100% users)

body.action_needed: Deployment readiness confirmed. Awaiting quality engineer approval (release_gate: true) to unblock deployment. After approval, proceed with staged rollout per deployment.json. Monitor Prometheus metrics and structured logs during rollout.
